directions: Simmer chicken stock in a medium saucepan
Heat the olive oil and butter in the Le Creuset over medium heat
Add the chopped onion, saute for 10 mins, stirring occassionally
Add the leeks and fennel, saute for 5 mins. Onion, leeks and fennel should be soft
Change the heat to medium high, add the rice, toast for about 2.5 mins
Add garlic for 30 seconds, be careful not to burn
Deglaze the pan with the wine, stir until all the liquid is absorbed
Add the chicken stock, 1 cup at a time, to the rice. Lower the heat so that liquid is simmering. Stir often
About 15 mins in, add the asparagus, peas, lemon juice, lemon zest and salt
Also about 15 mins in start testing for doneness. Rice should be al dente
Once all the liquid is absorbed, move off the heat and cover for 1-2 mins
Add the cheese (and chives, if using). Move to a warmed plate, shake it.
ingredients: 2 leeks, white and light green parts only (about 3 cups)
10 ounces frozen peas or lima beans, defrosted
title: Spring Risotto
